column4: hello, is there any good wallpaper changer for gnome in ubuntu repos?
See http://www.makeuseof.com/tag/5-wallpaper-changer-apps-for-linux/ (to me, best is the webliders)
thanks but none of those are in ubuntu repos... the only one is drapes but it sucks
You can get it from getdeb, using http://www.makeuseof.com/tag/5-wallpaper-changer-apps-for-linux/ (But getdeb is unofficial) Also try compiling from source
